name: Saviours Hand
description:
This is a quick paced arcade styled grab'em up, which means in the game you have to franticly pick up and grab the enemies and dispose of them before they get to the player by putting them in the red death zones to the left and right of the screen, if the players health drops it will slowly regen some but if you would rather a quicker method use the occasional health pick up and drag it onto the player to immediately give them a boost. its fun quick and simple arcade styled game mayhem.

made for: CGDJam2

controls: left click to pick up and grab an object and again to drop
